data.title: John Ross Ewing
data.meta_description: John Ross Ewing III is a fictional character from CBS primetime soap opera, Dallas. Actor Josh Henderson stepped into the role of John Ross in 2012 for the continuation of the series.
data.text:
John Ross EwingDallasPortrayed by Josh Henderson (others)Created by David JacobsDuration 1980-1991, 1996, 2012â€”First appearance April 2, 1978 John Ewing III: Part 2ProfileFamily EwingGender MaleDate of birth April 6, 1979 (1979-04-06) (age 45)

John Ross Ewing III is a fictional character from CBS primetime soap opera, Dallas. Actor Josh Henderson stepped into the role of John Ross in 2012 for the continuation of the series.
